generatedTitle: António Guterres: Secretary-General of the United Nations and Advocate for Human Dignity

extractFactDictList.question: Who is the current Secretary-General of the United Nations?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The current Secretary-General of the United Nations is António Guterres of Portugal.

extractFactDictList.question: When did António Guterres take office as Secretary-General?
What position did Mr. Guterres hold prior to becoming Secretary-General?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Prior to his appointment as Secretary-General, Mr. Guterres served as United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees from June 2005 to December.
extractFactDictList.phrase: United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees

extractFactDictList.question: What has Mr. Guterres centered his efforts on?
extractFactDictList.sentence: He has centered his efforts on ensuring human dignity for all.
